caption.p: The QSI activity of C. grandiflora flower extract and CFEE identified by report plates. ( A, C) LB agar plate incubated by C. violaceum 026; ( B) LB agar plate supplemented by C 6-HSL and incubated by C. violaceum 026; “CK”, negative control loading with methanol; “0”, C 6-HSL; “1”, CFEE.
